name: Subcube
description:
Subcube is a mind bending puzzle game. Rotate segments to construct cuboids. Use your imagination and creativity and push your spatial thinking to its limits in order to solve the puzzles. Find the least possible moves required and win medals.

  • 123 puzzles
  • Infinite skyfall mode
  • 18 achievements
  • No distractions, simple straight to the point game
  • No in-game purchases
